name: Summon Good Monster
text: You can summon the aid of creatures driven by their very nature to destroy evil.
benefit: When casting summon monster, you also gain access to the list of good monsters below. Your righteous determination grants these summoned creatures the Diehard feat. You may still summon creatures from the standard list, but without the Diehard feat.
benefit_zh:
当你施展召唤怪物，你能从善良怪物列表中选取要召唤的生物。你的正义信念给予这些召唤生物顽强专长。你仍可以从标准列表中召唤生物，但它们不会获得顽强专长。

善良怪物列表

1级

天界狗(Celestial dog,NG)

天界海豚(Celestial dolphin,NG)

天界鹰(Celestial eagle,NG)

天界火甲虫(Celestial fire beetle,NG)

天界矮种马(Celestial pony,NG)

天界毒蛇(Celestial viper,NG)

2级

天界狼(Celestial wolf,NG)

伪龙(Pseudo dragon,NG)

3级

皮克精(Pixie,NG)
